name: Udi-Ta
greetingText: To many years of cuteness and love.
wishText: As I age, my wild heart will live for younger days;)
textInChatBox: When I say I love you more, I donâ€™t mean I love you more than you love me. I mean I love you more than the bad days ahead of us, I love you more than any fight we will ever have. I love you more than the distance between us, I love you more than any obstacle that could try and come between us. I love you the most.
text2: I made this to mark a day and ...
text3: celebrate you by droping a note!
text4: Was chilling, decided to do something
text5Content:
Am,
 Making memories that never Fade!
outroText: I will always be by your side.
replayText: We are in this together , see you soon.
